segments.text: What a disastrous kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere from that stupid overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just polishing her plate, ignoring the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is soaked, and she doesn't care—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are filthy thieves with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing like an idiot on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to tip, and cookies will fly everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand is out, greedy for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor is a slippery mess now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the cabinet doors are dripping wet—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks clean and pretty, thank goodness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware they all are of this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR
